name: Agnes and the Temple of Fire
name_original: Agnes and the Temple of Fire
description:
Drawn by the mystery of an ancient city hidden deep in the jungle, the impulsive Percy marched off in to the wilderness. That was weeks ago. Percy has not be heard from since.

Agnes, resourceful and headstrong, ventures off in to the unknown to rescue her beloved.

Features
  • 13 Levels of non-violent gameplay
  • Tutorial
  • Deep lore
  • Special items
    • Time Crystals
    • Adamite Figurines
    • Ceremonial Masks
    • Heart Fungi
  • Time attack challenges
  • 180 x120 pixel resolution
  • Adequate platforming
  • Largely working collision detection
Notes

Compatible with MacOS only.

Credits
  • Game by Corin Edwards
  • Movement code by Shaun Spaulding
